altTitle: 創造錬金術師は自由を謳歌する 故郷を追放されたら、魔王のお膝元で超絶効果のマジックアイテム作り放題になりました
The Creator Alchemist Extols the Virtues of Freedom: When They Were Chased Out of Their Hometown, They Swore Fealty to the Demon Lord and Created Powerful Magic Items Non-Stop
title: Souzou Renkinjutsushi wa Jiyuu wo Ouka Suru: Furusato wo Tsuihou Saretara, Maou no Hizamoto de Chouzetsu Kouka no Magic Item Tsukuri Houdai ni Narimashita
